content.struggle_blockchain_tools: Are you struggling to find blockchain tools?
content.rumors: Maybe you've heard the rumors and they're getting louder
content.aigbot_developed: AIGbot is developed by top programmers in the cryptocurrency space.
content.focus_service_experience: We focus on service and user experience
content.goal_solve_troubles: The goal is to solve the troubles of crypto enthusiasts.
content.agibot_description: AGI Bot is a Token batch fast only trading Robot.
content.get_to_know_us: Would you like to get to know us better?
content.many_bot_unable_meet_needs: Many Bot are unable to meet the needs of crypto enthusiasts as well as Bot are unable to adapt to changes in the market in a timely manner for this reason many missed opportunities let's solve these troubles.
content.stability_description: Our project is built on a solid foundation, offering stability and reliability in an otherwise unpredictable landscape.
content.security_description: AIGbot puts the safety of your money first, AIGbot is independent of your local computer, that's why we don't do website!
content.solana_bot: We started with the Solana Market Value Management bot. Of course, we go beyond that.
content.stage_one: (STAGE ONE) X launch, Web launch, Telegram launch, Market Value Management bot Launched on Solana
content.stage_two: (STAGE TWO) Formation of the invitation mechanism, Improvement of Solana Market Value Management bot, Release of EVM Market Value Management bot
content.stage_three: (STAGE THREE) Customized versions of the robot according to customer needs, As well as aggregation of all robot functions on the market

content.struggle_blockchain_tools: 你在寻找区块链工具时遇到了困难吗？
content.rumors: 也许你听到了谣言，它们越来越响亮
content.aigbot_developed: AIGbot 是由加密货币领域的顶级程序员开发的。
content.focus_service_experience: 我们专注于服务和用户体验
content.goal_solve_troubles: 目标是解决加密爱好者的烦恼。
content.agibot_description: AGI Bot 是一个批量快速交易机器人。
content.get_to_know_us: 你想更好地了解我们吗？
content.many_bot_unable_meet_needs: 许多机器人无法满足加密爱好者的需求，且无法及时适应市场变化，因此错过了许多机会，让我们解决这些问题。
content.stability_description: 我们的项目建立在坚实的基础上，在不可预测的环境中提供稳定性和可靠性。
content.security_description: AIGbot 将您的资金安全放在首位，AIGbot 独立于您的本地计算机，这就是为什么我们不做网站！
content.solana_bot: 我们从 Solana 市值管理机器人开始。当然，我们不仅限于此。
content.stage_one: （第一阶段）X 启动，网站启动，电报启动，Solana 上市值管理机器人启动
content.stage_two: （第二阶段）邀请机制的形成，Solana 市值管理机器人的改进，EVM 市值管理机器人的发布
content.stage_three: （第三阶段）根据客户需求定制的机器人版本，以及市场上所有机器人功能的聚合
content.stage_four: （第四阶段）更多 EVM 支持。
